branchCategory.name: PF2D
branchCategory.description: <P>PF2D is a flow switch for liquids including high purity chemicals, solutions, and deionized water.  The PF2D is a remote sensor that sends output to a 4-channel panel monitor capable of reporting up to 4 separate outputs.  Three flow ranges are available, as well as 3 tube size connections.  The monitor displays instantaneous or accumulated flow, as well as an indicator for switch output.  This 4-channel monitor reduces installation, space, wiring and cost.</P>

branchItem.name: PF2D20, Digital Flow Switch for 4-Channel Flow Monitor, Remote Type Display Unit
branchItem.description: <P>SMC offers a variety of digital flow switches.  Among them is series PF2D, a digital flow switch for deionized water and chemicals.  This series consists of a remote type sensor unit with your choice of a single-channel remote type flow monitor, or a 4-channel remote type flow monitor.  Since 4 indicators were previously needed to monitor 4 sensors, the 4-channel monitor reduces the space required for installation.</P>
branchItem.bullets: <UL> <LI>4-channel flow monitor, remote type <LI>Space saving <LI>Applicable to e-con <LI>Multiple sensors (max. 4 pcs.) can be managed collectively <LI>Improved enclosure protection <LI>Multi-function <LI>Improvement in operability </LI></UL>

branchItem.description: <P>PF2D is a flow switch for liquids including high purity chemicals, solutions, and deionized water.  The PF2D is a remote sensor that sends output to a 4-channel panel monitor capable of reporting up to 4 separate outputs.  Three flow ranges are available, as well as 3 tube size connections.  The monitor displays instantaneous or accumulated flow, as well as an indicator for switch output.  This 4-channel monitor reduces installation, space, wiring and cost.</P>
